event.description: Brock Holt strikes out swinging.

Pablo Sandoval strikes out swinging.
Marco Hernandez grounds out to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Brock Holt singles on a ground ball to second baseman Ian Kinsler.

Mitch Moreland strikes out swinging.

Jackie Bradley flies out to right fielder Tyler Collins.

Marco Hernandez flies out to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Brock Holt walks.
